commandDescription: Splits profiles into various csv files
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input profiles. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output profiles. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a profile file in input. Example: Admin
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
ignoreuserpermFlagDescription: Specify if user permission must be ignored. Default '%s'
